Module hanyaeger.api
Package com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.entities.entity

Interface SceneBorderTouchingWatcher

All Superinterfaces:
Anchorable, Bounded, DimensionsProvider, DirectionProvider, GameNode, MotionModifier, Moveable, Placeable, SceneChild, SpeedProvider
public interface SceneBorderTouchingWatcher
extends Moveable, Bounded, SceneChild
Implement this interface to be notified if the YaegerEntity touches the boundary of the YaegerScene. In that case, the method notifyBoundaryTouching(SceneBorder) will be called.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void notifyBoundaryTouching​(SceneBorder border)
    This method is being called when this SceneBorderTouchingWatcher touches a border of the YaegerScene.
    default Updatable watchForBoundaryTouching()

  • Method Details

    • notifyBoundaryTouching

      void notifyBoundaryTouching​(SceneBorder border)
      This method is being called when this SceneBorderTouchingWatcher touches a border of the YaegerScene.
      Parameters:
      border - the border of the YaegerScene the YaegerEntity is touching

      default Updatable watchForBoundaryTouching()
